templates.name: Recent global events
templates.text: Search 3: Events taken place in last 24 hours

templates.name: Suez chokepoint
templates.cypher:
MATCH (n:Chokepoint {Name: "Suez Canal & Bab el-Mandeb"})
RETURN n

templates.name: Search phrase 6
templates.cypher:
MATCH p1 = ((:Port)-[*4..5]-(:Destination))
return p1, [ n IN nodes(p1) WHERE n:Chokepoint] AS arrayWithBNodes

templates.name: Search phrase 4
templates.text: Test Geo event: Find $label nodes within $distance of event
templates.cypher:
WITH "MATCH (n:" + $label + ") " +
  "WHERE point.distance(n.coords, point({longitude:-87.9482495827955, latitude:15.8468491734727}))" +
  " " + "<" +
  " " + $distance*1000 +
  " RETURN n" AS qryStr
CALL apoc.cypher.run(qryStr, {}) YIELD value AS nodes
RETURN nodes

params.name: $label
params.cypher:
CALL db.labels() YIELD label
WHERE NOT label IN [ '_Bloom_Perspective_', '_Bloom_Scene_' ]
RETURN label

templates.name: Search phrase 2
templates.text: Event: Find $label nodes within $distance of event
templates.cypher:
WITH "MATCH (n:" + $label + ") " +
  " RETURN n" AS qryStr

CALL apoc.cypher.run(qryStr, {}) YIELD value AS nodes
RETURN nodes

params.name: $label
params.cypher:
CALL db.labels() YIELD label
WHERE NOT label IN [ '_Bloom_Perspective_', '_Bloom_Scene_' ]
RETURN label

templates.name: Search for factories within a given radius
templates.text: Search 4: Factories within $distance km of Guangzhou
templates.cypher:
MATCH (f:Textile_factory)
WHERE point.distance(f.coords, point({longitude:113.2412255636869, latitude:23.120854268338633})) < $distance*1000
RETURN f

templates.name: Search phrase that returns unnamed ports
templates.text: Show ports where name is empty
